articles.title: Ukrainian forces brace for bloody fight for Kherson - Reuters
articles.description: Oleh, the commander of a Ukrainian mechanized infantry unit dug into trenches west of Kherson, is confident his Russian foes will be forced to abandon the <a href="/world/europe/why-ukraines-southern-kherson-region-is-strategic-prize-2022-10-24/">strategic</a…
articles.content: FRONTLINE WEST OF KHERSON, Ukraine, Nov 4 (Reuters) - Oleh, the commander of a Ukrainian mechanized infantry unit dug into trenches west of Kherson, is confident his Russian foes will be forced to ab… [+4972 chars]
